A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Spoilers ahead: Be Warned: My husband I both liked and enjoyed The Last Jedi. It was everything that a Star Wars movie was meant to be. I was kind of disappointed with some of the scenes which reminded me of ROTJ but other than that\, I enjoyed the movie. It was good to see Carrie Fisher in her role as Leia. I have a feeling that in the next movie that her son in the movie\, Kylo Ren will be the one to kill her and that will truly make him evil. I was saddened with the way that Luke died but knows he is with the Force and is not truly dead. I was thrilled though with the death of Supreme Leader Snook and Phasma. All in all\, a good movie and looking forward to the next one. Long live the Resistance!
